content.prompt: The designs used for San Ildefonso black-on-black pottery reflects the influence of which of the following traditions?

choices.label: East Asian porcelain imported during the early twentieth century
Early Mississippian pottery traded in the American Southwest
Textile patterns and production techniques used throughout the Southwest
Prehistoric pottery sherds found in the Southwest during the early twentieth century

topic.text: 5.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Indigenous American Art
